name: Wrapped365
headline: Spotify Wrapped All Year Round
description: No need to wait until the end of the year to see your listening habits. Wrapped365 gives you early insight to what you've been jamming to recently.

name: Disaster Dash
headline: A delivery service for disaster relief
description:
What happens when natural disaster strikes and you need supplies?

Disaster Dash connects natural disaster victims with volunteers who want to help. Disaster Dash uses SMS via Twilio to allow victims to make requests without WIFI which may be affected post disaster.

I built the front-end of this web appliction which visualizes the geographical locations of supplies requests and allows volunteers to fufill the requests.

name: Witway
headline: Traveling made easy
description:
WITWAY is a service for users who want an easy way to plan a solo or group trip in any US location. It features an itinerary generator based on user interests, a venue router, an a platform for users to review venues.

I built the client and server side for the trip routing and trip generation feature for Android Mobile.
